horses.name: The Wild Stallion
horses.description: Free-spirited and adventurous, you gallop to your own beat! You're independent, passionate, and always seeking new horizons. Nothing can fence you in!

horses.name: The Noble Mare
horses.description: Graceful and dignified, you carry yourself with elegance. You're loyal, caring, and have a natural ability to lead with compassion.

horses.name: The Racing Champion
horses.description: Fast, competitive, and driven! You thrive on challenges and never back down. You're focused, determined, and always pushing for excellence.

horses.name: The Gentle Pony
horses.description: Kind-hearted and approachable, you bring joy wherever you go. You're friendly, optimistic, and have a gift for making others smile.

horses.name: The Mystical Unicorn
horses.description: Creative and magical, you see the world through a unique lens. You're imaginative, artistic, and bring wonder to everyday life.

horses.name: The Reliable Work Horse
horses.description: Steady, dependable, and strong. You're the rock everyone counts on. You're practical, dedicated, and find satisfaction in a job well done.
